function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Airborne transmission of viruses in indoor environments","Impact":"Increased risk of infection and virus spread","Mitigation":"Improve ventilation, adopt less dense layouts, use operable windows","Technologies":"HVAC systems, automatic doors, hands-free light switches, antibacterial fabrics, voice-activated elevators","People":"Occupants of indoor environments","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers"},{"Description":"Surface-touch contamination as a mode of virus transmission","Impact":"Increased risk of virus spread through contact with contaminated surfaces","Mitigation":"Implement touch-free systems such as automatic doors, hands-free light switches, antibacterial fabrics, voice-activated elevators","Technologies":"Automatic doors, hands-free light switches, antibacterial fabrics, voice-activated elevators","People":"Occupants of indoor environments","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers"}]}
